thread.title: George Sibley
thread.title_full: Disc Makers reviewed by George Sibley

author: George Sibley
title: George Sibley
text: I've used Disc Makers before and always had good service. They offer the option of doing most of your input on line now, as everyone seems to do, but with my slow internet connection I still found it more efficient to mail in my DVD master for content. And I thought a bit of text on their on line proof of my box design looked a bit "off", but my tech told me it looked OK at their end, and it turned out fine on the final product. So talk with your product specialist if you have any doubts about the on line stuff, and all will be well.
